text: The meals are good, but unfortunately I have had better for the same amount of money or cheaper. The service isn't the greatest either. It is however a cute restaurant walking distance from home and that is the main reason I go back.

Pour un déjeuner classique sans souci!  De bon jus frais presser, mimosa avec du VRAI jus d'orange.. Miam. Délicieux smoothies et une catégorie super intéressante de déjeuners "RAISONNABLES". Très pratique blancs d'oeufs et fromage cottage, fruits et roties ect. Les déjeuners sont toujours délicieux mais le prix parfois un peu élever pour un déjeuner de base.   Pour un petit dej bon et agréable seul, entre amis ou en famille c'est une valeur sure. Le menu est vaste et très varier. Le staff super sympa et il y a une belle terasse avant.

Mauvais service,arrivée des assiettes avant les couverts,jus apporté dans un verre brisé,jus inclus avec mon repas mais jamais reçu malgré un rappel de ma part et par dessus le marché erreur de facturation!!! Beaucoup trop cher!!! Température et originalité des plats sont bien et  c'est pour cette raison seulement que ce restaurant reçoit une étoile de ma part. Stationnement sur les rues avoisinantes

We discovered Zagrum today while wandering down Fleury after finding our usual diner breakfast joint closed.   Our "greasy spoon" breakfast of 2 eggs, sausages, brown toast, homefries, fruit and coffee cost $7. A bit pricey for a basic breakfast but at least the fruit was fancy (pineapple, strawberry, orange, melon, blackberry), the homefries were real potatoes (not frozen potato product), and the toast was made from good-quality bread. I also appreciated that they had soy milk available for my coffee.  I couldn't help spying on the person at the table next to me, who had a "maki roll" breakfast -- little rolls of crepes with smoked salmon and asparagus drenched in hollandaise. She seemed to enjoy it. I managed not to ask her for a bite.

Awesome breakfast place! I've come here a couple of times and I've left super happy each time. Portions are great and the food is fresh & awesome. They have some pretty creative options as well, and the service was super friendly and quick. All in all a great place to eat!
Sat outside . Clean and very helpful staff. Waitress was patient explaining the menu since everything was in French . Delicious food . I especially enjoyed the fresh fruits and shakes.

Cute place, bright and modern. The food was good but my breakfast poutine lacked sauce and runny egg. My boyfriend had eggs Benedict with avocado and sweet potatoes instead of the usual English muffin. Amazing! The red pesto on top was spectacular. Nice choice in the menu and the names of the dishes are pretty funny too. In all it was a very nice breakfast place but just a tad too expensive. Service was abit slow but super friendly.

Bon petit resto à déjeuner/dîner dans le coin d'Ahuntsic.  Beaucoup de choix au menu. Les ufs bénédictines étaient bons.  Plutôt bruyant car aire ouverte, tout comme la plupart des restaurants à déjeuners ;) . Bon service rapide.  J'y retournerai probablement !

Très bonne place pour aller bruncher La salle est vraiment spacieuse, il y a beaucoup de tables, que ce soit au milieu ou sur les côtés, avec banquette Le choix de brunch est impressionnant (carte de 10 pages environ, avec ufs, omelettes, bénédictines, crêpes, poutines, etc..) Les portions sont généreuses, avec beaucoup de pain aussi Excellent service (pas besoin de demander pour du café, de l'eau, du ketchup, etc..) Prix corrects (entre 10 et 16$) A essayer!
C'est un endroit très bien mais un peu over-price. L'endroit est spacieux, parfait pour des brunchs en famille ou entre amis. Look moderne.

Went for breakfast at this cozy bistro located on Fleury Street and really enjoyed it! The bistro itself is cozy and has that homey feeling once you walk in. The service was super friendly and always smiley. Now for the food..this resto has a wide selection of dishes which are also quite creative. They do take reservations on weekends before 10am which is great!  They have original names for their dishes which is super cool. Eggs , bacon and pancakes were all well done and super tasty!  I will definately go back. This is a perfect spot for family brunches, friends get together, birthday brunches or any other special occasions!
Great place for breakfast, brunch! Great quality and very nice crew! From Classics to créations everything is amazing! Favorites jambon à l'os & French toast

Good place for a breakfast. They give a good portion of everything in your dish.   Lot of people around the area go to this restaurant.   The only thing I didn't like is the waitress ask for more tips when I give. It's like an obligation?   Good place for a breakfast but the service I give 0 star.
J'aime beaucoup. Ce n'est pas très cher et l'ambiance est bonne. Leurs crêpes au sucre d'érable est tout simplement succulente.

Went for breakfast last week and I was generally satisfied with this place. There was no wait and the service was quite quick but not memorable. The server took our order and never came back. We had to get up ourselves to get the bill. The food was OK and simple. I would come back if I am in the area, but other than that, I'll stick to other breakfast places.

Très bonne place pour luncher. Pas cher et portions très généreuse. Produits frais comme les fruits et le jus d'orange. Service rapide et à l'écoute. Petit bémol cependant à la présence quasi systématique de porc dans les combos et à la deco qui laisse à désirer. La note globale est tout de même bonne pour le rapport qualité/prix. J'y retournerais cependant même si je devrais me cantonner à un choix trop mince moi qui ne mange pas de porc.
